item.title: Certified in Functional Programming
item.description: I took the Functional Programming course on edX and completed it last month. Scored 99% :) This is the first time I am completing an online MOOC. Usually I drop all the courses after one or two weeks. Lazy me! Here is my VERIFIED certificateÂ signed by Dr.Erik Meijer:
